title: Life with the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/20
itunes:title: Life with the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/26/20
description:
George Noory and paranormal investigator Amy Bruni explore her career on supernatural TV shows like "Ghost Hunters," some of her scariest ghost sightings, and why people like being scared on her haunted ghost tours.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
